autumn.lang

Interface Lambda

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Functor, TypedFunctor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLambda

    public interface Lambda
extends TypedFunctor
    An instance of this interface is a lambda function.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void capture(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      This method is invoked to capture the state of a variable.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> closure()
      This method creates a map representation of the closure.
      int column()
      This method retrieves the column-number where the lambda is located.
      java.lang.String file()
      This method retrieves the path to the file that contains the lambda.
      int line()
      This method retrieves the line-number where the lambda is located.
      boolean valueAsBoolean(java.lang.String name)
      This method retrieves the value of a previously captured variable as a boolean.

      This method retrieves the value of a previously captured variable as a byte.

    • Method Detail

      • file

        java.lang.String file()
        This method retrieves the path to the file that contains the lambda.
        Returns:
        the path to the source code file.

      • line

        int line()
        This method retrieves the line-number where the lambda is located.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed line-number.

      • column

        int column()
        This method retrieves the column-number where the lambda is located.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed column-number.

      • capture

        void capture(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.Object value)
        This method is invoked to capture the state of a variable.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the variable.
        value - is the value to capture.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the name is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the variable was already captured.

      • valueAsBoolean

        boolean valueAsBoolean(java.lang.String name)
        This method retrieves the value of a previously captured variable as a boolean.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the captured variable.
        Returns:
        the value that was in the variable at the time it was captured.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the name is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the name does not refer to a captured variable.

      • valueAsChar

        char valueAsChar(java.lang.String name)

      • closure

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> closure()
        This method creates a map representation of the closure.
        Returns:
        an immutable map containing the values of the captured variables.
